column1: American director and composer '''Jules Bass''' (born [[16 September
column2: September 16]], [[1935]]) founded the [[Rankin/Bass]] production company, along with fellow director [[Arthur Rankin Jr.]] He and Rankin were the directors and producers of the animated adaptation of ''[[The Hobbit (1977 film)
column3: The Hobbit]]'' in 1977 and ''[[The Return of the King (1980 film)
column4: The Return of the King]]'' in 1980.
